About.Hours & facilities: Mon. - Fri. 9.30 am - 5.00 pm (closed 12.30 - 1.30). Reference assistance available in person and by phone, email & mail. Copying services available for original records to A3 and photographs.

About.Access: Photographic and pictorial collection housed at the Albany Co-operative Store Museum, 44 Frederick Street, Albany, postal address as above. It is administered by the Curator, who can be contacted in person or by phone (08) 9841-5403, on Tues, Wed, Thurs.

About.Acquisition focus: History of Albany and district and its residents. (5% in-house).

Contact.Street address: c/- Albany History Collection, Albany Public Library, 221 York Street, Albany WA
